I can't get it to work... Downloaded, installed and cracked, but nothing appears at the Skyrim Launcher (data files).

for those who are having issues with installation, please read this carefully...

You must use Winrar to extract the setup/data files. i recommend extracting these in a new folder. now, right click the iso, use your winrar options tab to extract its files to the new folder, in which case you should get a regular setup exe with a nice 'R' icon. click on that setup, and it will install the bsa and esm files altogether for you, the work is pretty much done for you. Hero did great job with this one, and again brother, i shall thank you.
